cause.description:
In the summer of 2006, two American women left home to live and serve in the Democratic Republic of Congo, a country oppressed by war and ravaged by violence against women and girls. Experience their story, chronicled via an original documentary podcast, and learn how you can tune in and change the world.
Please visit www.congocast.org for all the information and Video Podcast. Email us at info@congocast.org
1. Pray
2. Share
3. Donate
cause.mission: The violence in DR Congo has to stop.
cause.name: Congo Cast
